languages.text: Плоть кокона разорвана, и внутри него виднеется разложившийся труп. Судя по гримасе и позе, он умер лишь тогда, когда его маленькое убежище оказалось вскрыто.

traits.locale_text: Плоть кокона разорвана, и внутри него виднеется разложившийся труп. Судя по гримасе и позе, он умер лишь тогда, когда его маленькое убежище оказалось вскрыто.

languages.text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.
languages.original_text: Плоть кокона разорвана, и внутри него виднеется разложившийся труп. Судя по гримасе и позе, он умер лишь тогда, когда его маленькое убежище оказалось вскрыто.

traits.locale_text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.
The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.
The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.
The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.

languages.text: 茧壳已经被撕开，你看到里面有一具腐烂的尸体。根据尸体扭曲的表情与姿势判断，这个人是在这间小小的避难所被撕开时才丧命的。
languages.original_text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.

traits.locale_text: 茧壳已经被撕开，你看到里面有一具腐烂的尸体。根据尸体扭曲的表情与姿势判断，这个人是在这间小小的避难所被撕开时才丧命的。

languages.text: La carne de la crisálida ha sido desgarrada y distingues un cadáver putrefacto en el interior. A juzgar por su expresión y su pose, solo murió cuando su pequeño refugio fue abierto por la fuerza.
languages.original_text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.

traits.locale_text: La carne de la crisálida ha sido desgarrada y distingues un cadáver putrefacto en el interior. A juzgar por su expresión y su pose, solo murió cuando su pequeño refugio fue abierto por la fuerza.

languages.text: 繭の肉は引き裂かれ、中には腐敗した死体が入っている。歪んだ表情や姿勢から察するに、中にいた者はこの隠れ家が暴かれた直後に死んでしまったのだろう。
languages.original_text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.

traits.locale_text: 繭の肉は引き裂かれ、中には腐敗した死体が入っている。歪んだ表情や姿勢から察するに、中にいた者はこの隠れ家が暴かれた直後に死んでしまったのだろう。

languages.text: Das Fleisch des Kokons wurde aufgerissen, und im Inneren erkennst du eine verrottende Leiche. Dem verzerrten Gesichtsausdruck und der Pose nach zu schließen, ist die Person erst gestorben, als ihre winzige Zuflucht geöffnet wurde.
languages.original_text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.

traits.locale_text: Das Fleisch des Kokons wurde aufgerissen, und im Inneren erkennst du eine verrottende Leiche. Dem verzerrten Gesichtsausdruck und der Pose nach zu schließen, ist die Person erst gestorben, als ihre winzige Zuflucht geöffnet wurde.

languages.text: À l'intérieur du cocon éventré, vous apercevez un corps en décomposition. Sa posture recroquevillée et son expression torturée laissent à penser que la personne est morte après l'ouverture de son refuge, et non avant.
languages.original_text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.

traits.locale_text: À l'intérieur du cocon éventré, vous apercevez un corps en décomposition. Sa posture recroquevillée et son expression torturée laissent à penser que la personne est morte après l'ouverture de son refuge, et non avant.

languages.text: Kozanın eti yırtılarak açılmış. İçindeki çürümekte olan cesedi görebiliyorsun. Çarpık yüz ifadesine ve duruşuna bakılacak olursa bu kişi, küçük korunağı açıldığında ölmüş.
languages.original_text: The flesh of the cocoon has been ripped open and inside you can make out a decaying corpse. Based on the twisted expression and pose, the person died only when his tiny refuge was unsealed.

traits.locale_text: Kozanın eti yırtılarak açılmış ve içindeki çürümekte olan cesedi görebiliyorsun. Çarpık yüz ifadesine ve duruşuna bakılacak olursa bu kişi ancak bu küçük korunak açıldığında ölmüş.
